vclaim: In a Jan. 14 post, conservative pundit Candace Owen accused Nancy Pelosi and Democrats of having prior knowledge of the Capitol riots, and disregarding security warnings in order to “engineer” events to ruin former President Donald Trump’s life.
title: RUMOR ALERT: Did Candace Owens Accuse Pelosi of Knowing in Advance About the Capitol Riots?
subtitle: More evidence is required before this claim can be rated in a traditional Snopes fact check.
author: Nur Ibrahim
